backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, access control, and deletion logic with admin password gating.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking admin delete‑chatrooms gating to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten short summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache‑busting meta tags and script versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router defining lobby, chatroom, and admin delete‑chatrooms routes with conditional header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting uploads, removal, and Giphy search with debounced fetching and request cancellation.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message loading, auto‑scroll, replies, pinned video, and sending messages with media.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media previews, timestamps, and fetched thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, media upload, video URLs, and Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing and disables authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders chat messages with reactions, timestamps, media embeds, and reply/pin interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with media attachments, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component for playing audio messages with waveform visualization, time tracking, and synchronized playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that forces a fresh chatroom list refetch by purging stale cache entries once the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, state tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chatrooms, messages, and user-related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theme modes, layout rules, and custom UI element styling including voice player ranges.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers using compact notation (k, M, B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and map API responses into a simplified GIF model.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data into a safe preview object with caching and deduped requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter preview objects with validation and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs and generates thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs with various helper checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin interface for authenticating and managing chatrooms, including deletion and refetching logic.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders the ChatArea when data is available.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby with chatroom search, category filters, and creation dialog, fetching chatrooms and applying client-side filtering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project state, feature requests, issues, and architectural notes related to backend authorization changes and media URL handling.
